title: Sylvester Stallone, 73, shows off bulging biceps while daughter Sophia, 23, dons Tomb Raider costume
text:
He began starring as boxer Rocky Balboa in 1976.

And over 40 years later, Sylvester Stallone is still a knockout.

The 73-year-old actor looked buff as ever in a selfie posted on his Instagram featuring his 23-year-old daughter Sophia on Wednesday.

It seems like his eldest daughter is already prepared for Halloween next week as she was dressed as popular video game turned feature film character Lara Croft from Tomb Raider.

Dynamic duo: Sylvester Stallone looked buff as ever in a selfie posted on his Instagram featuring his 23-year-old daughter Sophia on Wednesday

Sly did not seem to join in on the costume fun as he simply referred to himself as a 'bodyguard' as he donned a black sleeveless top and jeans.

Sophia was also clad in all black including matching sleeveless top and bottoms with leather fingerless gloves.

Her blonde locks were worn down flowing over her shoulders as her make-up was finished off with blush pink lip.

Legend: The 73-year-old actor did not seem to join in on the costume fun as he simply referred to himself as a 'bodyguard' as he donned a black sleeveless top and jeans

Taking it seriously: Sophia was also clad in all black including matching sleeveless top and bottoms with leather fingerless gloves

Sly captioned the image to his 11.4million followers: '@sophiastallone getting ready to channel LAURA CROFT Tomb Raider for Halloween, with some strange bodyguard lurking in the background…'

Lara Croft was played by Angelina Jolie in 2001's Lara Croft: Tomb Raider and 2003's Lara Croft: Tomb Raider - The Cradle Of Life before Alicia Vikander starred in the 2018 reboot Tomb Raider.

In addition to Sophia, Sly shares daughters Sistine, 21, and Scarlet, 17, with wife Jennifer Flavin.

Back in August, the Stallone clan united to support Sistine at the LA premiere of her first film, 47 Meters Down: Uncaged.

Classic: Lara Croft was played by Angelina Jolie in 2001's Lara Croft: Tomb Raider (pictured) and 2003's Lara Croft: Tomb Raider - The Cradle Of Life

Stunning: Alicia Vikander starred in the 2018 reboot Tomb Raider

Proud dad Stallone made sure to document Sistine's big night, taking photos and videos using his smart phone.

Those he's been a consistent Hollywood fixture since his earliest work in the late-1960s, Stallone has recently returned to prominence with his acclaimed work in the Creed films, the first of which earned him his third Oscar nomination and his first Golden Globe win.

The actor also shares two sons with ex-wife Sasha Czack, including Sage, who passed away at age 36 in 2012.
description: The 73-year-old actor looked buff as ever in a selfie posted on his Instagram featuring his 23-year-old daughter Sophia on Wednesday.
